  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112420</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112420</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Trave</string>
            <string language="en">Grasses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gräser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Herbes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gramas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Erbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χλόες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hierbas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prosojnice zajemajo osnovne podatke o družini trav (primerno za razredno stopnjo) in prikazujejo 12 najbolj značilnih trav, ki jih najdemo v Sloveniji. S pomočjo slik učenci prepoznavajo trave, ki so jih našli na travniku in uredili v herbariju.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of grasses that are most common in Slovenia and can be found on almost all meadows.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">travnik</string>
            <string language="en">meadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">herbarij</string>
            <string language="en">herbarium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trava</string>
            <string language="en">grass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">botanika</string>
            <string language="en">botany</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Gräser, die in Slowenien am 
geläufigsten sind und auf fast allen Wiesen gefunden werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des herbes qui sont les plus 
communes en Slovénie et peuvent être trouvées sur presque tous les 
prés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação das gramas que são as mais comuns
em Slovenia e podem ser encontradas em quase todos os prados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione delle erbe che sono le più comuni 
in Slovenia e possono essere trovate su quasi tutti i prati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των χλοών που είναι οι πιό κοινόσι στη 
Σλοβενία και μπορούν να βρεθούν σχεδόν σε όλα τα λιβάδια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de las hierbas que son las más 
comunes de Eslovenia y pueden ser encontradas en casi todos los 
prados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wiese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herbarium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Botanik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pré</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
